meanings.sent1: Minkes swim gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw a pod of minkes during our whale watching tour.
meanings.sent3: The minkes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The minkes glided through the water like sleek submarines.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the minkes breaching was truly breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: There are many minkes in the exhibit at the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the minkes to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The minkes gathered for a group photo, looking quite adorable.
meanings.sent4: The minkes in the ocean seemed to multiply like magic.
meanings.sent5: The minkes' presence added a sense of wonder to the sea.
